name: Backtrace $2500 Game Jam - Group Trivia
description:
This is a multiplayer trivia game, where you are encouraged to help you teammates by sharing your knowledge through hints when it is their turn, and to take their knowledge in return when you are asked a question!

One to Four Players, PC only, possibly coming to android as well in the near future!

Created for the BackTrace $2500 GameJam by RealMcCoyGames developer Brandon. 

RealMcCoyGames@gmail.com
